message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

This paper investigates the efficiency of a semantic relatedness measure in an ad-hoc retrieval task, which is a common problem in information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also utilizes natural language processing (NLP) techniques such as WordNet and collocation index, which are commonly used in computational linguistics (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL).
